alert.note: Alert for Portage; Waupaca; Wood (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 9:48PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Wood, Portage and western Waupaca Counties through 1030 PM CDT... At 948 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lake Wazeecha, or 9 miles southeast of Wisconsin Rapids, moving east at 40 mph. Continuous heavy rainfall may also cause ponding on roads. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hartman Creek State Park, Chain O` Lakes-King and Waupaca. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for central and northeastern Wisconsin.
